title: Troops to stay put in Syria even as Biden seeks to end America’s ‘forever wars’
content:
1. Troops to stay put in Syria even as Biden seeks to end America’s ‘forever wars’  POLITICO
  2. Biden announces end of US combat mission in Iraq  CNN
  3. Not Afghanistan: Why the US and Iraq won't leave one another  DW (English)
  4. Biden announcement on ending U.S. combat mission in Iraq is a case of misdirection  NBC News
  5. Opinion | Why leave Afghanistan but not Iraq? Biden's policy makes little sense.  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: バイデン氏が米国の「永遠の戦争」の終結を目指しても、軍隊はシリアに留まる。
即使拜登寻求结束美国的 "永久战争"，部队仍将留在叙利亚。
即使拜登尋求結束美國的 "永久戰爭"，部隊仍將留在敘利亞。
